content: sew the button in the center of poppy tie both tail ends together and trim you can either hot glue gun or sew a brooch pin to the back of your poppy or use a simple safety pin to attach your poppy to the left side of your coat copyright - christina pridie - all rights reserved - 2022 2/3 poppy - is worked in the round from the bottom up using the magic loop technique otherwise double pointed needles are optional with 3 75 mm circular needle cast on 48 stitches using the cable cast on technique join in the round and proceed as follows rounds 1 - 4 - *k4 p8* repeat from *to* to end of round round 5 - decrease round *k2tog 2 times p2tog 4 times * repeat from *to* to end of round - 24 sts round 6 - decrease round *cdd* repeat from *to* to end of round - 8 sts cut yarn leaving a 12 inch tail with threaded tapestry needle drawn yarn through remaining 8 stitches twice to secure push tail end through the center hole to the right side of poppy with same tail end sew button in the center of poppy weave in ends glue or sew a brooch pin on the back of your poppy or use a simple safety pin to attach it to the left side of your coat remembrance day lest we forget november 11th copyright - christina pridie - all rights reserved - 2022 this pattern can only be used for personal use and gift giving you may not photocopy or sell this pattern or the items made from this pattern for personal gain or otherwise thank you for respecting the rights of the designer 3/3
